Title: An Act Naming the San Fernando-Bagulin Road in the Province of La Union to Francisco I. Ortega Highway
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 691
An Act Naming the San Fernando-Bagulin Road in the Province of La Union to Francisco I. Ortega Highway
Section 1. The road from Quezon Boulevard in the Municipality of San Fernando to the poblacion in the Municipality of Bagulin, Province of La Union, which is referred to as San Fernando-Bagulin Road, is hereby named Francisco I. Ortega Highway.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: March 7, 1984
